column4: at 4.40 pm an accident on Road 33 between Kilometer Post 18-19  in Damnak
column5: Kep left an 11 year old dead and a 14 year old seriously injured.------A 14 year old girl riding a moto was sent to a hospital in Vietnam
column6: while her 11-year-old passenger died at the scene. Both were from the local area.------A white Lexus  Phnom Penh 2AT-1307 was left at the scene after the driver ran away. Both vehicles were taken to Kep City Police Station.------Police are now searching for the driver. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/460982
